imdb.title: Tales of Zestiria the X
imdb.plot: The tale of the Shepherd, a savior who will bring peace to the seraphim and human worlds, becomes Sorey's reality after a fateful encounter.

episodes.title: World without Malevolence
episodes.plot: Sorey and the party arrive at Lastonbell, a commercial city in Rolance. There, they see Rose's base of operations.

episodes.title: Wind Seraph, Dezel
episodes.plot: Sergei visits Sorey again, and the two work out a truce. They start investigating suspicious malevolence-related incidents in Lastonbell together.

episodes.title: Each One's Principles
episodes.plot: Dezel decides to take matters into his own hands, and begins destroying the city. Sorey, Rose and the Seraphim must stop him.

episodes.title: Revenge
episodes.plot: Rose decides to part ways with Sorey, due to some urgent business she is not willing to discuss. Mikleo and Edna follow her to investigate.

episodes.title: Justice at Hand Rather Than Ideal Beyond One's Reach
episodes.plot: Rose finally tracks down her ultimate target, the man responsible for the death of her adopted father. Despite Sorey's efforts to stop her, Rose leaps in for the kill.

episodes.title: Negotiation
episodes.plot: Sorey meets the emperor of Rolance and enters the city of Pendrago. He must find the cause of the unending rain, but the price for the solution is greater than expected.

episodes.title: Ladylake
episodes.plot: The city of Ladylake is again threatened by tornados. It will be days before Sorey can return, so Alisha must do the best she can to minimize the damage.

episodes.title: Purification
episodes.plot: Alisha's mentor Maltran is captured, an obvious trap for luring Alisha into Ladylake. Knowing this, Alisha and her soldiers still infiltrate the city.

episodes.title: The Ideal World
episodes.plot: Ladylake is saved, but this is only the first step towards saving the whole world from a larger threat. The party regroups and prepares to face the final and worst foe - the Lord of Calamity.

episodes.title: The Land to the North
episodes.plot: Sorey learns that the Lord of Calamity is in the northern lands, a desolate area imbued with some unknown power. During the travel, Rose and Alisha attempt to learn a new power.

episodes.title: Be Like the Wind
episodes.plot: With the Lord of Calamity near, Sorey and the party prepare for the final battle. They must find a way to get through the dozens of dragons that have gathered.

episodes.title: The Chosen Answer
episodes.plot: Sorey finally reaches the Lord of Calamity. He must find a way to defeat this powerful being, and begins by peering into his past.

episodes.title: The Legend
episodes.plot: The Lord of Calamity unleashes his overwhelming power and malevolence. Sorey, Alisha, Rose, and the Seraphim must unite their powers in a way nobody has ever imagined.

episodes.title: Age of Chaos
episodes.plot: Strange weather phenomena strike the Kingdom of Hyland. Alisha, a courageous and patriotic warrior-princess of the Hyland kingdom, sends herself to investigate.

episodes.title: Capital of Seraphim
episodes.plot: Alisha, now alone and without hope, wanders into a ruin. Meanwhile, two young men, Sorey and Mikleo, stumble across a ruin as well.

episodes.title: Elysia
episodes.plot: Alisha traveled so far from home just to find and speak to the Seraphim, who she believes hold the key to mankind's salvation. Ironically, she does not have the ability to see or hear the Seraphim, even while being in a town full of them.

episodes.title: The Sacred Blade Festival
episodes.plot: After leaving Elysium, Mikelo and Sorey arrive to Lady Lake, where the festival of the Sacred Blade is currently taking place.

episodes.title: The Shepherd's Destiny
episodes.plot: Our new Shepherd, Sorey, wakes up after being knocked out for three whole days. Being Lailah's vessel so suddenly caused much strain on his body. Upon waking up, he finds out that he's in Alisha's manor, and that Alisha saved him and nursed him back to health.

episodes.title: Dawn of Chaos
episodes.plot: Velvet Crowe swears to kill her sworn enemy, Artorius. When Seres the Malak, ally to Artorius, comes to break Velvet out of prison, Velvet is full of questions.

episodes.title: Velvet Crowe
episodes.plot: Velvet and Seres face off against Oscar, a powerful Praetor-class Exorcist tasked to stop them. A duel between Velvet and Oscar erupts. Meanwhile, an ominous shadow looms over the island.

episodes.title: Each One's Feelings
episodes.plot: The tornado threatening Ladylake reveals a dragon inside, but it mysteriously leaves after doing some damage to the city. With the city out of immediate danger, Sorey, Alisha and Mikleo each have different plans.

episodes.title: Rayfalke Spiritcrest
episodes.plot: Sorey and Lailah arrive at Rayfalke Spiritcrest, and meet Edna, Zaveid, and a giant dragon. Meanwhile, Mikleo arrives at the ruins and begins to explore.

episodes.title: The Plagued City
episodes.plot: A storm has destroyed an important bridge, preventing Alisha and Maltran from reaching their destination. When Sorey arrives at the scene, the team discovers that the storm is not natural.

episodes.title: Alisha Diphda
episodes.plot: With the hellion plaguing the city purified, the city of Marlind takes its first step towards recovery. However, a rider arrives to deliver bad news to Alisha.

episodes.title: The War
episodes.plot: Accompanied by Sorey and a new ally, Alisha leads her forces to Glaivend Basin. She must stop the terrible war from starting, or at least end it before the fighting creates irreparable amounts of malevolence.

episodes.title: The Lord of Calamity
episodes.plot: Sorey confronts the Lord of Calamity, the powerful hellion feeding on the malevolence generated by the pain and suffering of war. Sorey, Alisha and Rose must bring a stop to this war, but Alisha is injured by a friendly soldier.
